str2: Then, at that time. From ho and hote; the when, i.e. At the time that.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Of unknown origin; a maiden; by implication, an unmarried daughter.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) I wake, arouse, (b) I raise up. Probably akin to the base of agora; to waken, i.e. Rouse.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To put into order; I decorate, deck, adorn. From kosmos; to put in proper order, i.e. Decorate; specially, to snuff.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Genitive Feminine 3rd Person Plural

str2: A torch, lamp, lantern. From lampo; a 'lamp' or flambeau.
